data.name: Beedrill

attacks.name: Nadir Needle
attacks.text: If you have no cards in your hand, this attack does 120 more damage, and your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

data.flavorText: May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent speeds, all the while stabbing with the toxic stinger on its rear.

attacks.name: Twineedle
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Swarming Sting
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each of your Beedrill V in play. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Twineedle
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Swarming Sting
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each of your Beedrill V in play. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each of your Beedrill V in play. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Beedrill

attacks.name: Persist Sting
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has any Special Energy attached, it is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Jet Spear
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent speeds, all the while stabbing with the toxic stinger on its rear.

data.name: Beedrill

abilities.name: Elusive Master
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is the last card in your hand, you may play it onto your Bench. If you do, draw 3 cards.

data.flavorText: May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent speeds, all the while stabbing with the toxic stinger on its rear.

data.name: Beedrill

attacks.name: Poison Jab
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

data.flavorText: May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent speeds, all the while stabbing with the toxic stinger on its rear.

data.name: Beedrill

attacks.name: Destiny Stinger
attacks.text: You can use this attack only if this Pokémon has any damage counters on it. Both Active Pokémon are Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

data.name: Beedrill

attacks.name: Sudden Sting
attacks.text: If this Pokémon evolved from Kakuna during this turn, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

data.flavorText: May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent speeds, all the while stabbing with the toxic stinger on its rear.

data.name: Beedrill

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Swarming Sting
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage times the number of Beedrill you have in play to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent speeds, all the while stabbing with the toxic stinger on its rear.

data.name: Beedrill

attacks.name: Allergic Shock
attacks.text: During your next turn, if the Defending Pokémon is damaged by an attack, it is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Twineedle
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent speeds, all the while stabbing with the toxic stinger on its rear.

data.name: Beedrill

attacks.name: Poison Jab
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Flash Needle
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads. If all of them are heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

attacks.name: Hazard Stinger
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned. Put 4 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.

attacks.name: Double Scrapper
attacks.text: Discard up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards attached to your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pin Missile
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

data.name: Beedrill

attacks.name: Swift Sting
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has full HP, this attack does 40 more damage, and the Defending Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

data.flavorText: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.

data.name: Beedrill

attacks.name: Twineedle
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Paralyze Poison
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is also Paralyzed.

data.flavorText: It can take down any opponent with its powerful poison stingers. It sometimes attacks in swarms.

attacks.name: Raid
attacks.text: If you played Beedrill G from your hand during this turn, this attack's base damage is 40 instead of 10.

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

data.name: Beedrill

abilities.name: Flutter Wings
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Grass Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Beedrill is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Needle Shock
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned. Ignore this effect if any of your Pokémon used Needle Shock during your last turn.

data.flavorText: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.

data.name: Beedrill

attacks.name: Band Attack
attacks.text: Does 30 damage times the number of Beedrill you have in play.

attacks.name: Twineedle
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.

abilities.name: Final Sting
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may Knock Out Beedrill. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns. This power can't be used if Beedrill is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Super Slash
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolved Pokémon, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Link Needle
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage for each Beedrill (excluding this one) you have in play.

abilities.name: Venom Spray
abilities.text: When you play Beedrill from your hand to evolve your Active Pokémon, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Needle Rush
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. If you get 1 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage. If you get 2 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage. If you get 3 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 50 more damage. If you get 4 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 90 more damage.

abilities.name: Venom Spray
abilities.text: When you play Beedrill from your hand to evolve your Active Pokémon, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Needle Rush
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. If you get 1 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage. If you get 2 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage. If you get 3 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 50 more damage. If you get 4 heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 90 more damage.

attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

data.flavorText: Flies at high speed and attacks using the large, venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

data.name: Beedrill

attacks.name: Triple Poison
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Your opponent now puts 3 damage counters on it instead of 1 after each player's turn (even if it was already Poisoned).

attacks.name: Pin Missile
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: It can take down any opponent with its powerful poison stingers. It sometimes attacks in swarms.

attacks.name: Nerve Poison
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Hyper Needle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. Either way, you can't use this attack again as long as Koga's Beedrill stays in play (even putting Koga's Beedrill on the Bench won't let you use it again).
